cast.name: 杰奎琳·麦根斯 Jacqueline McKenzie

writer.name: 凯瑟琳·史密斯-麦克马伦 Catherine Smyth-McMullen

trans_title: 花有重开日 第二季
introduction: A greater miracle or a greater curse?The award-winning Stan Original Series Bloom has returned for a new season, continuing the story of the mysterious and inexplicable 'fountain of youth' that transformed the lives of a country community in the wake of a devastating flood. Now, time has passed and news of this “miracle” has spread, while some locals are hoping that they’ve seen the last of this phenomenal yet ultimately destructive plant. When newcomers arrive, however, a battle between science and faith erupts, and we discover the properties of this new, “second-generation” plant, are vastly more formidable than the first.
chinese_title: 花有重开日 第二季
